  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    Manages the socket traffic for the server socket, differs followers from clients and initializes different threads: - If client is connected, SingleGameServer thread starts - If follower is connected, FollowerThread thread starts Initializes MongoDB and File deleter
